    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(int targetRow, int targetCol, Board board)
      Checks if moving this piece to (targetRow, targetCol) is valid according to chess rules. This checks if the move is in the piece's possible moves.
      Parameters:
      targetRow - The row to move to.
      targetCol - The column to move to.
      board - The current board state.
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise.
